title: Grateful Dead Live at Veterans' Memorial Coliseum on 1983-04-22
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 04/2012
source: AUD: 2x Beyer M-88's > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell MX-90s, set up at the end of the floor, fifteen rows up in the riser, taped by Joe Morrone.
